message.name: LINK_NODE_FLOW_CONTROL
message.description: Message generated by a link endpoint and injected into the MAVLink stream for purposes of flow control.
message.field: Transmitted bytes per second, UINT16_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Recieved bytes per second, UINT16_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Transmit bandwidth consumption. Values: [0-100], UINT8_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Receive bandwidth consumption. Values: [0-100], UINT8_MAX: invalid/unknown.
